name: Unstabrick Maze
description:
Controls:

  • Use WASD for movement
  • Click the left mouse button to shoot

Attention:

  • Move to the question mark to enter the next level   
  • Bricks are unstable! They appear and disappear from time to time
  • Monsters are deadly. Stay away from them!  
  • Bullets are limited, they can smash through walls and monsters (except for the big fish)
